Locale.Value:
- When importing text files, support selecting folders for batch import
- Custom CSS can also be used when exporting to images, PDF, etc.
- Memos can be displayed in the form of cards
- You can right-click the selected text in the editor to add it as the content of a new card
- Add letter spacing settings
- Add a setting option "Automatically backups are only made when content changes", with the default setting being enabled
- Add a new One-click formatting rule: Remove solo empty line
- Fix some minor issues and make some improvements to the details

- 导入文本文件时，支持选择文件夹批量导入
- 导出为 图片、PDF 等格式时也可以使用自定义 CSS
- 备注可以以卡片的形式显示
- 可在编辑器中将选中文字右键添加为新卡片的内容
- 添加字间距设置
- 默认仅当内容变化时才自动备份
- 一键排版增加“移除单个空行”规则
- 修复一些情况下备注内容修改后没有保存的问题
